Exclusive BrightFunded Trading Offer

BrightFunded, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in September 2023, is a CFD firm offering a two-step evaluation program. Account sizes range from $10,000 to $200,000. Platforms supported include MT5, cTrader and the BrightFunded Platform (DxTrade). Tradable instruments include cryptocurrencies, forex currency pairs, indices, commodities and global stocks; leverage options are listed as 1:100 for forex, 1:40 for gold and commodities, and 1:20 for indices. The evaluation includes profit targets of 8% in Phase 1 and 5% in Phase 2 and a peak total drawdown of 10% across accounts. The firm has a 4.6/5 review score from 92 reviews. This summary outlines BrightFunded\u2019s service offering and structure. validated by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
